synopsis.text: Animation student Saori Suzuki presents a captivating exploration of chance and potential in her first-year project at Tokyo University of the Arts. The anime centers around a game where images are discovered by chance, with the aleatoric nature of the game revealing far more possibilities than initially anticipated. With music by Miki Sakurai, sound design by Tomoya Matsuura, and production by Koji Yamamura, this anime promises a unique and thought-provoking experience that will leave viewers pondering the endless potentials of chance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
